## Type of change

- [ ] New meeting name(s) - the good stuff
- [ ] Bug fix - something was broken
- [ ] New feature - something shiny
- [ ] Documentation - words about the code
- [ ] Refactoring - same behavior, cleaner code
- [ ] CI/CD - pipeline changes
- [ ] Other - explain below

## Checklist

- [ ] I've run the tests (`poetry run pytest`)
- [ ] I've run the linter (`poetry run ruff check .`)
- [ ] I've run the formatter (`poetry run ruff format .`)
- [ ] My code doesn't add unnecessary complexity to a single-endpoint API
- [ ] I haven't added blockchain

## If adding meeting names:

- [ ] They're pub-themed
- [ ] They sound vaguely professional
- [ ] They contain at least one terrible pun
- [ ] HR probably won't notice
